name: listSchedule
description:
The schedule endpoint produces a linear TV schedule for a given channel and date range.

 - The date range supplied must be no larger than 21 days.
 - If no end data is passed the API will default to start date + 24 hours.

channelId.description: The identifier for the selected channel.

start.description: The Start Date for the schedule.

end.description: The End Date for the schedule.

aliases.description: Flag to display Legacy and Provider Ids.
